comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Yup, it was a cold, sloppy mess up there today. In fact, I'm still feeling it. As much as I claim to love this slop, I really am looking forward to those first balmy rides of Spring. DU

comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: You guys put the "boys in blue" to shame...! Way to weather the ride!

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: "it" was a cold sloppy mess? Are you referring to yourself in the third person again, Dave?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Yo, iSean... I would've said _lukewarm_ sloppy mess, now wouldn't I? You need to slow down and read more carefully, just like Mrs Adams told you in the second grade. DU
